parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the server-side script that sends the events.

parameters.name: options.enabled
parameters.description: Whether the connection should be established immediately. Default: true.

parameters.name: options.onOpen
parameters.description: Callback triggered when the connection is successfully opened.

parameters.name: options.onMessage
parameters.description: Callback triggered whenever a new message event is received from the server.

parameters.name: options.onError
parameters.description: Callback triggered when a connection error occurs.

parameters.name: options.withCredentials
parameters.description: Whether the browser should send cookies or HTTP authentication with the request. Default: false.

returnValues.name: readyState
returnValues.description: The current state of the connection: 0 (Connecting), 1 (Open), or 2 (Closed).

returnValues.name: close
returnValues.description: Manually closes the connection and prevents further updates.
